entry.title: 5/31 - CALL FOR EXHIBITS 2018/19 ‚Äì GIFTS OF ART - MICHIGAN MEDICINE, UNIVERSITY OF MICHIGAN
entry.content:
GIFTS OF ART - MICHIGAN MEDICINE, UNIVERSITY OF MICHIGAN
üìç Ann Arbor , MI, United States
üé® All Visual Arts
üìÖ 05/31/2019 deadline
üí∞ unknown fee
‚û° Apply


====== DESCRIPTION ======

CALL FOR EXHIBITS 2018/19 ‚Äì GIFTS OF ART - MICHIGAN MEDICINE, UNIVERSITY OF MICHIGAN
The Gifts of Art Program is seeking submissions for solo and group art exhibits for the September 2019 to August 2020 exhibition year. One of the first and most comprehensive arts in healthcare programs in the nation, Gifts of Art brings the world of art and music to Michigan Medicine at the University of Michigan. Nine 2-D and 3-D galleries throughout the medical center are viewed by approximately 10,000 people a day and display over 30 exhibits a year. The Exhibition Program is designed to calm nerves, lift spirits, and engage minds. This supports the healing process and reduces the stress and anxiety often associated with a healthcare setting. Engaging with the arts in a medical setting can be an especially powerful, even transformative experience for patients and visitors. For more information about Gifts of Art at Michigan Medicine, please visit www.med.umich.edu/goa .

To see the full prospectus and submit to this call, please visit:
www.michiganmedicinegiftsofart.submittable.com/submit

SUBMISSION REQUIREMENTS
‚Ä¢ Original artwork only
‚Ä¢ Enough artwork to fill an entire gallery site
‚Ä¢ Resume/CV
‚Ä¢ A description of the proposed exhibit
‚Ä¢ A minimum of 15 quality JPEG images for solo artists
‚Ä¢ A minimum of 24 quality JPEG images for group shows
‚Ä¢ No application fee
IMPORTANT DATES
‚Ä¢ DEADLINE FOR SUBMISSIONS - May 31, 2019
‚Ä¢ NOTIFICATIONS SENT TO ARTISTS - July 15, 2019
QUESTIONS? Call Gifts of Art at 734.936.8829 or email kmtalley@umich.edu


===== INSTRUCTIONS =====

https://michiganmedicinegiftsofart.submittable.com

entry.title: 5/1 - Space 776 | Open Call
entry.content:
Space 776
üìç Brooklyn, NY, United States
üé® All Visual Arts
üìÖ 05/01/2019 deadline
üí∞ $25.00 fee
‚û° Apply


====== DESCRIPTION ======

Space 776 is holding an open call for artists both from the NYC area, as well as internationally, for a two week free solo¬†exhibition in Fall 2019 (dates TBA with selected artist).


Eligibility

Any visual artist over the age of 18 may feel free to apply, regardless of their level of formal education in the arts. The gallery accepts any¬†medium; painting, photograph, sculpture, print, design, etc. Once all applications are submitted, the gallery will select an artist and send out an announcement by the end of July.


Details

The artist will receive a two-week solo exhibition (no cost) in Fall 2019¬†at the gallery, along with a promotion package (artist's video & interview, social media promotions). The selected artist¬†will also be featured alongside¬†Space 776 artists in a¬†booth of a future¬†art fair.

Please download the submission form from our website, space776.com/opencall.

Application Checklist:
- Submission Form
- Curriculum Vitae (CV)
- Image of artwork
- Processing Fee

The deadline for submitting applications is May 1st, 2018. All applications are subject to a one time non-refundable processing fee of $25 via PayPal or Chase QuickPay.

Contact
If you have any questions regarding the open call application please contact Space776 at:

229 Central Avenue
Brooklyn, NY 11221
info@space776.com
+1 (718) 552-2169


===== INSTRUCTIONS =====

Fee:
A non-refundable entry fee of $25 paid via PayPal or Chase Quick Pay to info@space776.com

Application Time Frame:
Open in till May 1st, 2019

Notification:
Artist will be notified on the status of their application in 1 -2 days after the application

Application Checklist:
* Entry Form
* CV
* Image of the art work
* Entry Fee
